q: Alors qu'elle a r?cemment ouvert les portes de son dressing, Angelina Jolie a r?v?l des petites secrets sur sa garde-robe. La star d?teste le jean! Je n'ai pas un seul jean. C'est assez bizarre, mais je me suis rendue compte en cr?ant notre famille, que si j' avais des jeans et des t-shirts dans mes placards, je ne ferais que porter cela avec mes enfants. Donc j' ai fait le choix de ne pas en avoir pour me forcer? faire un effort d'habillement quotidiennement , a- t-elle expliqu? la version anglaise de OK! Magazine. said David Letterman .`` Being pummeled?'' Anderson Cooper said.`` I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before.'' He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. I thought I was saying calm down, as if they could understand what I was saying. Most ratings figures count TV viewership only within the 24-hour period after a show is aired. By this standard, The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is the champ in total viewers, as well as in Conan O'Brien -- ratings success and David Letterman calls So now that the hype is over, is`` Conan O'Brien '' still delivering to the satisfaction of TBS? an engagement at Chelsea Place in Manhattan. She hired a then-unknown piano player for that engagement; a young man fresh from New Orleans named Harry Connick Jr. , Harry Connick Jr. , who later introduced her at a David Letterman Christmas party as one of the world's finest jazz singers. That four-week engagement lasted for three years for Cynthia Scott , and she decided to stay in New York. Since then, she has headlined at Birdland, Iridium, Dizzy's Club Coca Cola and many more.

Instead Mr. Donald Rumsfeld takes a fairly direct approach: This is what I did and why I did it with the information at hand.
